fields.name: additionalFocalPointOffset
fields.desc: Any additional offset the focal point requires to "point" to the correct place.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: The border radius for this magnifier.

fields.name: filmColor
fields.desc: The color to tint the image in this [Magnifier].

fields.name: shadows
fields.desc: A list of shadows cast by the [Magnifier].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: Whether and how to clip the [shadows] that render inside the loupe.
